title: Fall Baking Workshop
description: Join us for a fun fall-themed baking workshop! Learn to make seasonal treats with your friends, family, and neighbors. All skill levels welcome. This event costs $5 per person and is free for kids under 12.

title: Holiday Cookie Decorating
description: Decorate holiday cookies with us! All ages welcome. Bring your friends and family for a festive morning of creativity and fun. Materials provided. Cost is $5 per person.

title: Cupcake Masterclass
description: Learn professional piping techniques and flavor combos. Perfect for aspiring bakers and cupcake enthusiasts. This event costs $10 per person.

title: Cookie Tasting Night
description: A tasting event featuring our yearly variety of cookies. Bring your friends and family to sample and vote for your favorites. This event is free for everyone.

title: New Year Community Meet-up
description: Start the year sweet â€” gather with your community and enjoy delicious treats together. All are welcome. This event is free, but bring your own dessert or snack to share.
